record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - November 09, 2007)

[Page: H13428]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I just realized that yesterday on H.R. 3093, rollcall No. 1076, I voted "aye." I meant to vote "nay" because as a Democrat, I would never do anything that would inflict harm upon my Hispanic brothers and sisters.
